original_text: And thou shalt give the money, wherewith the odd number of them is to be redeemed, unto Aaron and to his sons.
korean_text: 그 더한 자의 속전을 아론과 그의 아들들에게 줄 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt give the money
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그 돈을 주어야 하리라

sentences.original_text: wherewith the odd number of them is to be redeemed
unto Aaron and to his sons
